name: Escape the Eusapia
description:
Escape the Eusapia is a maze, treasure hunt game where it was inspired by the story “Cities & The Dead 3” in “Invisible Cities” book. People of Eusapia’s underground city has gone corrupt, and currently are looking for anything alive to kill. You, the player are stuck in the mystery maze while you were escorting the dead. The player will have only certain amount of time before they can collect all the gems that let the player go through the exit and escape the maze. If the time runs out, the deads will find the player and it will be over forever. Can you make it out alive?

Project by SeungMin Jun (Lab 2)
